briefTitle: MT10109L in the Treatment of Glabellar Lines
officialTitle: A Multicenter, Double-blind, Randomized, Placebo-controlled, Parallel-group Study to Evaluate the Safety and Efficacy of MT10109L (NivobotulinumtoxinA) for the Treatment of Glabellar Lines
summary: To evaluate the safety and efficacy of MT10109L in the treatment of glabellar lines (GL) in participants with moderate to severe GL.

primaryOutcome.measure: The Percentage of Participants With a â‰¥ 2-grade Improvement From Baseline on the Facial Wrinkle Scale With Photonumeric Guide (FWS) According to INVESTIGATOR AND PARTICIPANT Assessments of Glabellar Lines (GL) Severity at Maximum Frown at Day 30
